title: Error HH201: Could not set param noTypechain for task compile because its name is already used.
body:
Hello!
I'm having an issue with calling `hardhat`. With every call, I get the same message.
```shell
macPro@Monterey12 testNFT % npx hardhat node --no-deploy
Error HH201: Could not set param noTypechain for task compile because its name is already used.

For more info go to https://hardhat.org/HH201 or run Hardhat with --show-stack-traces
macPro@Monterey12 testNFT % npx hardhat node --no-deploy --show-stack-traces
Error HH201: Could not set param noTypechain for task compile because its name is already used.

HardhatError: HH201: Could not set param noTypechain for task compile because its name is already used.
    at SimpleTaskDefinition._validateNameNotUsed (/Users/testNFT/node_modules/hardhat/src/internal/core/tasks/task-definitions.ts:440:13)
    at SimpleTaskDefinition.addFlag (/Users/user/testNFT/node_modules/hardhat/src/internal/core/tasks/task-definitions.ts:184:10)
    at OverriddenTaskDefinition.addFlag (/Users/user/TtestNFT/node_modules/hardhat/src/internal/core/tasks/task-definitions.ts:723:31)
    at OverriddenTaskDefinition.addFlag (/Users/user/testNFT/node_modules/hardhat/src/internal/core/tasks/task-definitions.ts:723:31)
    at Object.<anonymous> (/Users/user/testNFT/node_modules/hardhat-packager/node_modules/@typechain/hardhat/src/index.ts:20:4)
    at Module._compile (node:internal/modules/cjs/loader:1103:14)
    at Object.Module._extensions..js (node:internal/modules/cjs/loader:1157:10)
    at Module.load (node:internal/modules/cjs/loader:981:32)
    at Function.Module._load (node:internal/modules/cjs/loader:822:12)
    at Module.require (node:internal/modules/cjs/loader:1005:19)
```

I have the HardHat project setup as a [npm _workspace_](https://docs.npmjs.com/cli/v8/using-npm/workspaces) package with other packages (IPFS, network configs, web services, etc) in relation. 
I'm working on Node v16 using the latest hardhat version.

This issue is also being [tracked on Linear](https://linear.app/nomic-foundation/issue/HH-443/error-hh201-could-not-set-param-notypechain-for-task-compile-because).

We use Linear to manage our development process, but we keep the conversations on Github.

LINEAR-ID: 080c500b-a03c-4fe4-a4fa-d8589a99b4cb
Hi @tamaramack, can you share your Hardhat config, or at least tell us which plugins (and versions) you are using?

Resolved issue by downgrading version of hardhat by a major version and upgrading typechain's version to latest.
```json
    "@nomiclabs/hardhat-ethers": "^2.0.3",
    "@nomiclabs/hardhat-etherscan": "^2.1.8",
    "@nomiclabs/hardhat-waffle": "^2.0.1",
    "@typechain/ethers-v5": "^9.0.0",
    "@typechain/hardhat": "^4.0.0",
...
    "ethers": "^5.6.1",
    "hardhat": "^2.8.4",
    "hardhat-deploy": "^0.9.14",
    "hardhat-deploy-ethers": "^0.3.0-beta.11",
    "hardhat-gas-reporter": "^1.0.6",
    "hardhat-packager": "^1.3.0",
...
    "typechain": "^7.0.1",
    "typescript": "^4.5.2"
```
